org.forgerock.openig.header
Class ContentLengthHeader

java.lang.Object
  org.forgerock.openig.header.ContentLengthHeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Header, Clearable, Indexed<String>
public class ContentLengthHeader
extends Object
implements Header

Processes the Content-Length message header. For more information, see RFC 2616 §14.13.

Field Summary
 long length
          The content length, or -1 if not specified.
static String NAME
          The name of the header that this object represents.

fromMessage

public void fromMessage(Message message)
Description copied from interface: Header
Populates the content of the header from the specified message. If the message does not contain the appropriate header, callign this message has no effect (will not change the values of the header).

Specified by:
fromMessage in interface Header

fromString

Description copied from interface: Header

Specified by:
fromString in interface Header

toMessage

public void toMessage(Message message)
Description copied from interface: Header
Sets the header in the specified message. If the header is empty, calling this method has no effect (will not erase existing instances of the header in the message).

Specified by:
toMessage in interface Header

toString

public String toString()
Description copied from interface: Header
Returns the header as a single string value. If the header is empty, this method will return null.

Specified by:
toString in interface Header
